name: Base Craft: Desolate Survival
description:
Base Craft: Desolated Survival is a Co-op Twinstick survival shooter using local couch co-op using xbox controllers or use Steam Remote Play to play with your friends online with xbox controllers or mouse and keyboard using only one copy of the game!

Stranded on an unknown planet, you and your friends must do what you can to survive. Use resources that you collect nearby to craft guns, turrets, walls and other devices and items to build a base, strong enough to stand against increasing numbers of foes. Use your pick axe to mine resources to build shotguns, flamethrowers, sniper, mines, sentry guns, walls, drones and medicine to keep yourselves alive! The choice between a strong wall, a deadly turret or reviving a fallen comrade is all up to you in this real time base building - twin stick shooter experience. Earn money to spend in the in game currency store to buy stronger items to use in the next battle.
